Wines By Body

This is a rundown of the Winelist for Duke's Beachhouse Maui. It's a work-in-progress so please be forgiving!

View On GitHub

    Wines By Body

    Wines by body, Lightest to Fullest. Tasting light bodied to full-bodied is similar to tasting the difference between skim to whole milk.

    • Whites
      • Sparkling
        • Prosecco
        • Cava
        • Champagne
      • Riesling
      • Pinot Gris
      • Sauvignon Blanc
      • Fumé Blanc
      • Sémillon
      • Viognier
      • Chardonnay
    • Reds
      • Cinsault
      • Pinot Noir
      • Cabernet Franc
      • Grenache
      • Merlot
      • Nebbiolo
      • Sangiovese
      • Tempranillo
      • Bordeaux Blend
      • Cabernet Sauvignon
      • Malbec
      • Petit Sirah
      • Syrah
      • Zinfandel
      • Port
